fullDescription.intro: HfpFis generates a FIS using "Hfpfis" FisPro Function. It generates the FIS from a configuration (e.g. configuration generated by Hfpsr Node) and a dataset. Click here for more informations.

option.name: Choose wm as rule induction method (default: fpa is used)

fullDescription.option: choose wm as rule induction method, fpa is default

option.name: Minimum cumulated weight for a rule to be generated (0.0 default value)

fullDescription.option: minimum cumulated weight for a rule to be generated (0.0 default value)

option.name: Strategy to determine the data subset used to initialize the rule conclusion, 0 for MIN, 1 for DEC (default value)

fullDescription.option: the strategy to determine the data subset used to initialize the rule conclusion, 0 for MIN, 1 for DEC (default value)
the output number (default value: 0, first output)
